name: Super Marquinho
description:
In this game, the main character Marquinho tries to free his darling who was kidnapped by a bandit named Wendigo. 

On his way, our character encounters various obstacles that need to be overcome and enemies that need to be faced, while collecting diamonds and keys that will allow him to unlock and move to a new level.

The game is still in development and you can try out our free demo!

The demo includes a tutorial that explains the obstacles and diffrent enemies. Three diffrent levels with increasing difficulty and a final boss fight !

Control Scheme Left arrow key - Move to the left Right arrow key - Move to the right Up arrow key - Jump A or S or D- Sword attack Spacebar - Spell attack
